resources.string: Bevorzugte Apps, welche für die unten stehenden Links direkt verwendet werden.\n\nDrücken um eine bevorzugte App zu entfernen.

Bevorzugte Apps, welche direkt verwendet werden wenn die unten stehenden Links mit dieser App geteilt werden.\n\n Sie können bevorzugte Apps auswählen, indem Sie Links mit dieser App teilen und dann auf \"Immer\" klicken

Remove %1$s as the preferred app to load %2$s links with?

Note: You can set a new preferred app to use next time you share %3$s link.
The shared content did not have any valid URLs.
No other application found to handle the URL.
Improve the application sorting by giving access to Usage Stats.
See licenses of open source libraries.
Send me an email before giving a 1 star.
More apps by Said Tahsin Dane
Gefällt dir app? Schauen Sie anders doch bitte.
Did it ever happen to you?
I come to rescue you whenever you get stuck in browsers.
You click a short-link and somehow you end up being stuck in web page instead of watching the video directly.
Just share it with me and I will switch apps for you.
Select ALWAYS to tell me to open that link always with a specific app.
Add to Home screen to quickly access your fav links with your fav apps.
Give access to USAGE ACCESS and I will work better. I will detect the browser you are sharing from to act accordingly.
Usage Access Settings cannot be open.\n\nYou may access it by going into Settings -> Security
Failed to open the link with selected app. Try again later.
